analysis.description:
Reentrancy in ALTCrowdsale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/45/0x55225774775fcf8a804d77d6cfdf0e951b0236f0.sol):
	External calls:
	- token.burn(maxTokensSold - tokensSold) (/unique_chucks/45/0x55225774775fcf8a804d77d6cfdf0e951b0236f0.sol)
	- token.transfer(beneficiary,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/45/0x55225774775fcf8a804d77d6cfdf0e951b0236f0.sol)
	- token.transferOwnership(beneficiary) (/unique_chucks/45/0x55225774775fcf8a804d77d6cfdf0e951b0236f0.sol)
	External calls sending eth:
	- beneficiary.transfer(collected) (/unique_chucks/45/0x55225774775fcf8a804d77d6cfdf0e951b0236f0.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- crowdsaleFinished (/unique_chucks/45/0x55225774775fcf8a804d77d6cfdf0e951b0236f0.sol)

ALTCrowdsale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/45/0x55225774775fcf8a804d77d6cfdf0e951b0236f0.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(beneficiary,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/45/0x55225774775fcf8a804d77d6cfdf0e951b0236f0.sol)
